error.message: Return type of method Drupal\oop_forms\Form\Element\Element::getDefaultValue() has typehint with deprecated class Drupal\Core\Entity\Entity. Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityBase instead.

Parameter $defaultValue of method Drupal\oop_forms\Form\Element\Element::setDefaultValue() has typehint with deprecated class Drupal\Core\Entity\Entity. Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityBase instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to oop_forms.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
A drupal/core requirement is not present in composer.json. Having a composer.json is not a requirement for Drupal 9 compatibility but if there is one, it should include a drupal/core requirement.
